name: Custard
overview:
Northern-based search engine marketing agency Custard Media Solutions have quickly gained a reputation for providing insightful, innovative SEO solutions that deliver tangible results for clients across a wide range of competitive industries.

Founded in 2009, our team is young and enthusiastic, yet boasts an impressive wealth of experience in all aspects of online marketing. A remarkable portfolio of clients benefit from a complete online marketing mix, which has helped Custard make serious waves amongst the SEO community.

By not only providing clients with improved site traffic but also working with them to increase the conversion rates of existing visitors, we have made great strides in our early years and have positioned ourselves amongst the top online marketing organizations in the North of England.

Directors Sam Allcock and Adam Livermore have over ten yearsâ€™ experience in the online industry working with numerous high-profile clients, and they are supported by a vibrant team of in-house journalists, account managers, programmers and link builders to ensure that the whole spectrum is covered.

Custard Mediaâ€™s search engine marketing services include basics like onsite optimisation, SEO-friendly content writing, link building, and PPC services, as well as some of the more emerging techniques like blogging, social media marketing and viral video promotion. Throw in a considerable expertise in ecommerce design, reputation management and online PR and Custardâ€™s range of services makes for impressive reading.
